name: Gain DAO
description: We trade, you earn. Gain DAO is a series of crypto-currency denominated trading pools that generate a passive return for token holders. Gain DAO elects pool managers to trade our crypto assets inside regulated brokers. As the pools grow from the trading activity the value of GAIN tokens increases proportionately. GAIN tokens represent a share of a pool and are redeemable for the pool's underlying asset (Ether). By holding GAIN tokens, you are automatically staked and earning any rewards our pool managers generate. All Gain DAO tokens are 1:1 backed by the assets in our trading pools. No GAIN tokens can be put into circulation without first being exchanged for Ether. Our pools are audited several times a day by Myfxbook in order to maintain transparency at all times: https://www.myfxbook.com/members/GainDAO/gain-dao-ethereum-pool/9606098
